text:
BOARD OF EDUCATION
CITY OF ST. LOUIS
DIVISION OF AUDIO'VISUAL EDUCATION
1517 SOUTH THERESA AVENUE (4)
February lU, 1956
Dr. Harry J. $komia, Executive Director
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
ll; Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
In re: Dr. H. E. Williams, President
Southern College
Walnut Ridge, Arkansas
Dear Harry:
Dr. Williams stopped in this afternoon to visit KSLH and get
further information concerning NAEB. He will join, Ifeel
sure and is anxious to get all the material that you can send,
him. He is a radio man, having had experience in several
commercial stations but is sold now on the idea of operating
an educational station.
Just thought you would like to get in touch with him.
Cordially,
Marguerite Fleming, Manager
Station KSLH
